Episodes.Actors: Adelaide Kane, Megan Follows, Torrance Coombs
Episodes.Plot: As Francis leaves Court to find Lola and his child, he must try and avoid the plague, back at Court Mary and Catherine must keep safe from the plague while the nobles and servants are getting sicker and sicker.

Episodes.Plot: As Bash is being healed by the white witch, an old enemy shows up. Francis is on the edge of death and Mary must help Scotland from being under attack. Mary must make a decision to stay with Francis or go to Scotland with Conde.

Episodes.Actors: Adelaide Kane, Megan Follows, Torrance Coombs
